page.title: 01Tiddington and Shabbington
page.content: This block contains the villages of Tiddington, Shabbington and Albury as well as Draycot and North Weston,which are no more than a collection of houses.The area centres round the A418 which is the main road from Wheatley to Thame and Aylesbury and joins the A40(T). The River Thame runs through the block and forms the boundary between Buckinghamshire and Oxfordshire.The area is predominantly a farming community although this clearly does not support the whole population,many of whom travel out of the area to work.
